captions.text:
[Announcer] Welcome
to Eyewitness News at 6:OO
with Susan Ortega,

Evan Baxter,
Fred Donohue-- sports,
Dallas Coleman-- weather.

And now, Bumalo's
number-one news team.

Good evening, and welcome
to Eyewitness News at 6:OO.
t'm Susan Ortega.

And l'm Evan Baxter,
and here's what's
making news.

A potential scandal
with the Buffalo P.D.
surfaced today...

when the mayor--
[ Stutters, Screeches, Coughs ]
[ High-Pitched Gibberish ]

[Clears Throat, Continues
In High-Pitched Tone ]

- l'm sory. l'm seem to
have something stuck in my--
- Somebodyget him somewater.
[ Clears Throat ]

[ Laughs Like Hyena,
Clears Throat ]

Oh. There we go.
Sory about that.
[ Clears Throat ]

ln other news,
the prime minister ofSweden
visited Washington today,

and my tiny little nipples
went to France.

What did hejust say?
Check the prompter.

- The prompter's fine.
- Evan, read the copy, please.
The copy's good.Just read it.

The White House
reception committee greeted
the prime rib roast minister,

and l do the cha-cha
like a sissy girl.

- [ Snickering ]
- l ''lika'' do the cha-cha.

l'm sory.
We seem to be having
some technical difficulties.

- In other news--
- [ Flatulence ]
[ Extra-Loud Flatulence ]
[ Continues Clearing Throat ]
[Angy Gibberish ]

[ Sniffs, Clears Throat,
Speaks Angy Gibberish ]
[Gibberish Continues ]
[ Gibberish ]

[ Gibberish ]
Doo-doo, caca, poo-poo.

[ Gibberish ]
Pee-pee!
[ Grunts ]
[ Gibberish, Laughs ]
## [ Piano ]
